revisionDesc.change: Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/o.berenike;2;226' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/ddbdp;2016;2'
Submit - Rename this to a DDbDP 2016 number
Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - Back again for further updates.

Vote - AcceptText - I agree for the replacement of (ἑκατονταρχίαϲ) by (δεκανίαϲ) at lines 2 and 3. I am more reserved for changes at lines 5-6. At the end of line 6, κερα( ) ι is alright (I consider that the curved stroke above represents the α (the same is true for lines 2 and 3), but it needs a lot of imagination to see τεασμ, even with dots… As for ἐλαβ, ε was practically invisible, and the proposed α instead is as well. After λαβ there is space for one letter, then what Rodney and Roger read α (think of χ?) then ν. I would at least dot all the letters except λαβ and ν

Submit - Line 3: the symbol is for δεκανίας, not ἑκατονταρχίας, and Kronios is therefore a cameldriver and not a soldier, which makes sense. In line 2, we presume that the symbol for δεκανίας is in the lacuna on the left--this would explain why Kronios is said to be from the _same_ dekania. Line 4: we've dotted the stigma and, in the comm., suggested the alternative reading of gamma. Line 5: ἐλαβ( ) αν ̣ ̣( ) of the ed.pr. is discarded in favor of the equally obscure αλαβανω( ), which we conjecture is a personal name. Line 6: instead of ἐλαβ̣( ) plus traces, read [Πε]τ̣εασ̣μ̣(ήφιος) [κ]ε̣[ρ](άμια) ι. We've also added an introduction and commentary notes. An infrared photo is available upon request.

batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
